content.heading: C++ ctime Functions
paragraphs: The <ctime> library has a variety of functions that allow you to measure dates and times.
With this library, you can retrieve the current date and time, manipulate time values, and perform time calculations. It is essential for applications that require time tracking or scheduling.
Common functions include time, localtime, and difftime, which help you work with time values and convert between different time formats.
Using the <ctime> library can significantly simplify the process of handling time-related tasks in your C++ programs.
